description:
5l: optimize the common case in patch()
    If p->to.sym->text is non-nil, then no need to search for sym->value.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ab6805d0865a ***

5l: optimize the common case in patch()
    If p->to.sym->text is non-nil, then no need to search for sym->value.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5601046

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5601046: 5l: optimize the common case in patch()
